title: Galaxie Polaris V3 + Condensed / Buttoned up / 2008.09.30
content:
Hi!  
Best wishes from Brooklyn; we can see Wall Street from here, and it's a mess!

We have two new releases - actually, one update and one new release. And we'd like to get a little political.

/ / / / /

New release: Galaxie Polaris V3 + Galaxie Polaris Condensed

Finally, our popular Polaris family has three things people have been asking for: small caps, Cyrillics, and a condensed complement.

Version 3 of Galaxie Polaris features some small but important improvements and adds small caps (with its own specific punctuation) and Cyrillic script support.

Galaxie Polaris Condensed was started in 2005, used for a conference identity program in 2007, and completed in 2008 for use by the Alliance for Climate Protection. (We also created a special version of Galaxie Polaris Bold for the Alliance, which can be seen in the group's WeCanSolveIt advertising.)

We are offering a special upgrade price for existing licensees: Galaxie Polaris V3 plus Condensed for US$149.

Obama buttons

With 5 weeks until Election Day here in the US, it is imperative that all eligible voters register to vote. And - sorry Republicans - vote for Barack Obama. He is a dream come true: a thoughtful, intelligent, energetic leader; a constitutional law expert who will do what's best for his country, not his cronies.

We have designed and produced a set of Obama Heart buttons. We love hearts and we love Obama. The buttons are US$10 within the US, and we are shipping sets out daily for quick delivery.
